ygData.subject: Re: Re: Unknown Words
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You are welcome. ... They have never updated the research sections, and Banshee aura uses Eradication and Derivation. ... Sell them, they have removed the
ygData.messageBody:
Lomack wrote:

> From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>
> Ok First off I just wanted to tank you all for your prompt responses.
> However I have moved back to one of my original questions.
>

You are welcome.

>
> According to the Mythiran Tower and to EQCasters:
> Banshee Arua uses Words of Divination and Words of Eradication
> I am still left with wondering what Words of Derivation are used for....?
>

They have never updated the research sections, and Banshee aura uses Eradication and Derivation.

>
> Thanks for the info about the Words of Pacification. Now the only question
> is do I sell them or hang on to them in hopes that they will put the 24th
> level Charm spell back in the game.
>

Sell them, they have removed the spell, and will only replace it with a new one (If they ever get around to it.)

>
> I ended up selling that non stacking words of Dominion. It was annoying
> me and sold for the same as the Stacking words of Dominion.
>
> I'll pop off an identify spell on the faded page when I am in game next.
> If that dosen't work I'll just give it to one of the enchanters in my guild
> and let them worry abou it. :)
>

Identify will say nothing about it :)
Just give it to an Enchanter, they use the faded pages by putting them in thier research book seperatly, and hitting combine, and they will get a torn page with a number.

>
> Again thanks for the help.
>
> Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
> Master of Recruiting
> www.bck.org
> "The Crimson Knights"
> Fennin Ro
